attributes.action: put me back in the top set for french at my school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a great moment of biased marking, my french teacher has put me in the 2nd set for french, this would not normally bother me but if i am in the top set, i get to do my gcse early, which i really wanted to do. I was really upset by the news, and i really want to do my gcse early, if i get enough votes, i hope to get back there. Please help me!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
